content: top 9 fo and cut yarn completed top if you would like a strap to add to the back of the bottom shells follow the pattern below chain enough to wrap around your waist or lower torso area for a small i did 150 and for a medium i did 200 and for a large i did 250 these are only recommendations and you can chain as many as needed to suit your body type after putting the top on insert the chain you just made into the two sides of the shell where we chained 5 and then wrap it around your back and tie final credits completed top weave in your ends and if you do post this top make sure to tag me @sproutstitch4 you may sell what you have made as long as you credit me first and add my socials i hope you loved making this pattern and i hope to see the tops you made
